entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -27.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 06:00 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -27.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 44 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -36.2°C
Wind: WSW 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023
